name: Portfolio

projects.title: Korean Lyric Web App (In Progress)
projects.description: The app utilizes Cheerio for web scraping, allowing users to access a vast collection of songs and albums. It provides Romanized, English, and Hangul lyrics, all presented with a sleek and user-friendly design, offering an immersive experience for Korean music enthusiasts.

projects.title: RightStufAnime Store Alerts
projects.description: A python script that scrapes up to 2,546 products from RightStufAnime website utilizing BeautifulSoup and requests. Users can extract product data into a CSV file or can search for products within Discord.

projects.title: Newegg Automated Checkout
projects.description: Utilizes Selenium with Chrome WebDriver to automate the checkout process based on the user's product selection. Before browser is launched, user is prompt with JOption inputs to input personal data that is stored in objects locally and then loops until the item is in stock to proceed.

projects.title: Racing Game
projects.description: A Unity racing game where the user races against an AI (Artificial Intelligence), free store assets where utilized to create the map and C# scripts for the AI and mechanics of vehicle movement.

projects.title: Bank System
projects.description: A console-based banking system made with C++. The user has a variety of options such as Depositing, Withdrawing, Applying for a Loan, locating ATMs and couple more.

projects.title: Personal Music Website
projects.description: First basic website that I worked on alongside 3 peers for school project. Uses very simple HTML/CSS and uses Spotify API to embed a playlist of the group member's respective favorite songs.

projects.title: Y-Maze Spontaneous Alternation
projects.description: Extracts CSV file data that contains the mouse's X and Y coordinates and position value (1 or 0) with its timestamp. This streamlines the process of finding the total amount of Spontaneous Alternations and extracts the outputs into a text file.

services.title: Front-End Development
services.description: I am skilled in creating applications using Vite, React, and Node.js, with a focus on building responsive user interfaces and efficient back-end systems.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I have the ability to design visually appealing and user-friendly web pages and mobile apps using Figma. I can create intuitive and engaging interfaces that enhance the overall user experience.

services.title: Back-End Development
services.description: I am proficient in backend development using Express, allowing me to create robust API endpoints and routes for seamless data interaction. Additionally, I have experience working with Supabase, a powerful SQL database platform, to efficiently manage data storage and retrieval for scalable applications.

services.title: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)
services.description: With my expertise in Java, Python, and C++, I have a strong foundation in object-oriented programming (OOP) techniques. This enables me to design and implement efficient and modular code structures, leveraging encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism to create reusable and maintainable software solutions.

aboutpara:
I am a highly motivated individual with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the University of Houston-Downtown. I have a strong passion for software development and enjoy working on various projects that challenge me and allow me to expand my skills.

I have experience with several programming languages including Python, C++, and JavaScript, as well as web technologies such as HTML, CSS, Vite, and tailwind. I am also proficient in working with backend technologies like Supabase.

In addition to my technical skills, I have a keen eye for design and enjoy using tools like Figma to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. I believe that combining functionality with aesthetics is essential in creating successful software applications.

I am a quick learner and always strive to stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies. I am passionate about collaborating with teams to develop innovative solutions and contribute to the success of projects.

Overall, I am a dedicated and enthusiastic individual with a strong foundation in computer science and a wide range of technical skills. I am eager to apply my knowledge and continue to grow as a software developer.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.
